item.title: Understanding Delta Lake's Change Data Feed
item.description: The release of Delta Lake 2.0.0 came with an exciting new feature called Change data feed which tracks row-level changes to a delta table. This ability unlocks new use cases: Batch selection of new data; previously new rows could be streamed from a delta table, but streams are opaque. Batch mode enables new patterns which operate on a whole set of changes. Streaming Change Data Capture (CDC) rows from delta tables, similar to MySQL’s binlog.
